posts.author: Scylon
posts.content:
Hi there,

I have sniffed around the forums for level 30 builds and while there is a few I find myself hungry for more. It's an interesting server as far as mechanics go. Makes for a good read: http://wiki.arelith.com/Category:Classes

I'm currently running a pure Wizard but am looking for something more melee as my character spends most of his time behind his summons not even casting. 

Rules: 

- Max Level 30
- Any class taken must be a minimum of 3 consecutively (can take them any were after you get that minimum)
- Cannot use Shifter, Assassin, Harper or RDD
- No alignment shifts (there is a few special rules around alignment. EG Bards can be lawful)

Also there is a coupe of "extra" classes like the spellsword.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hello Scylon, and welcome!

If you want a stand-out meleer for Arelith just cast your eyes over this little beauty from Mick Dagger: Arelith Brawler

Of course, if you want something weird (aka a caster) others will have to help...

Cheers
